meanings.definition: To change the style or appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: She decided to restyle her hair for the party.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer was hired to restyle the living room.
meanings.sent3: After a mishap with the scissors, she had to restyle her hair into a unique look.
meanings.sent4: The artist sought to restyle the canvas with bold strokes of color.
meanings.sent5: With a few simple tweaks, she managed to restyle the outfit into a trendy ensemble.

meanings.definition: To give a new style to something.
meanings.sent1: He wanted to restyle his old car to make it look modern.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer aimed to restyle the classic dress into a contemporary piece.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to restyle the traditional dish with a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: She sought to restyle her room into a cozy retreat with new decorations.
meanings.sent5: The hairstylist was able to restyle her client's hair into a chic bob.
